item.title: Body returned from Gaza is not Shiri Bibas, Israeli military says
item.description: Israel has accused Hamas of violating the ceasefire - a claim to which Hamas has not yet responded.

item.title: Man disguised as lawyer kills gang leader in court
item.description: Police say the gunman used a revolver which was smuggled in a hollowed-out book by a female suspect.

item.title: Canada beats US in revenge hockey rematch played on political thin ice
item.description: The two countries battled it out at the final game of the 4 Nations Face Off amid a tense political backdrop.

item.title: Hong Kong's main opposition party announces plan to dissolve
item.description: Once Hong Kong's largest opposition party, the Democratic Party has suffered since China's crackdown.

item.title: Three buses explode in Israel in 'suspected terror attack', police say
item.description: While no casualties have been reported at this stage, all public transport services have been paused.
